document.full_text: david beckham's rush back from the royal wedding to play for l.a. galaxy in dallas ended in a soggy defeat sunday with his team falling to a 2-1 loss at pizza hut park.
document.title: beckham's royal return ends in defeat for galaxy
lines_and_colors: david beckham's rush back from the royal wedding to play for l.a. galaxy in dallas ended in a soggy defeat sunday with his team falling to a 2-1 loss at pizza hut park.
